data.title: LMT Connection
data.meta_description: In 2006 LMT joined forces with the world famous Chops Horns to record their "Color Me Funky" CD/DVD in Germany. The album was an international success and led to LMT's European "Soul Circus" tour uniting these two dynamic groups live ... Read More
